attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the public popularity of Gordon Brown in the last few months and in the shadow of resent council elections we the undersigned call for the Prime Minster to let the public decide if he is still a suitable individual to run the country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
